name: Beach Flag Paradise
description:
Run, jump, and grab the flag!
A full fledged beach flag game on resort island is born!
In this game, appearing competitors are all girls!
Win or lose, we realize tight match with four competitors!

[Main Feature]
*Control
Press run button repeatedly to accelerate, and by tapping the jump button in good timing, your character will dive and catch the flag.
In addition, we reproduce the unique movements in beach flag using smartphone.
You can start the dash by raising up the smartphone, and change the direction by
tilting it.

*Game Mode
Loaded two game modes competing with three opponents (CPU).
In "Standard", you must acquire the flag faster than anyone. And in "Flag Hunt",
you must find out the flag that are placed somewhere in the course.
Your control technique and judgment will be tested.

*Course
You can enjoy beach flag in variety types of courses like straight and wide sand beach, and courses with rock and pine trees.
In addition, we prepared short and long distance courses.
Your strategy will significantly change in each distance.

*Characters
The girls among various countries have appeared!
Usable character will increase by playing game longer.
You can able to choose your favorite character to play.
Grasp the personality of each character well, and try to clear the difficult courses!
